text: S-Connection Featuring Anabelle, commonly referred to as simply S-Connection, is a Swedish dance-pop and electronic music group. Established in 1994, the group debuted with a contract from Sidelake Productions, a subsidiary of Virgin Records. With three successful singles to their credit during 1994-95, the quartet (including Jonas Rabe, Hakan Lundberg, Henrik Kool and vocalist Anabelle) released their debut album, Disconnected, in 1995. By 1997, the LP had appeared in Japan and in the U.S. The album is now owned by Parlophone Music Denmark A/S. Category:Music Category:Swedish musical groups
title: S-Connection Featuring Anabelle
